name: oracleoflight
0:
”Alexa open oracle of light”
”Alexa launch oracle of light”
”Alexa run oracle of light”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oracle of light
des:
** NEW FEATURE ** Ask the Oracle <<send me an email>> and receive your conversation with the AI by email. You need to grant permission to use your email in the Alexa App, by selecting the skill and then its Settings.
 
Engage the Oracle of Light in a conversation on a topic of your choice. The skill connects to the chatGPT language model developed by OpenAI, trained using a large amount of textual data and able to answer questions and provide information on a wide range of topics.
The oracle is able to answer all your curiosities. It knows all the scientific and humanistic subjects, economics, politics, social sciences. You can ask it to summarize a book, write a poem or define the itinerary of a vacation. It knows everything up to 2021 and is at your service.
Since the skill connects to an external API provided by OpenAI, time out could occur for the users of the skill when the latency increases: this is an expected behavior when using an external API, and not a malfunction of the skill.
DISCLAIMER: The information provided by the skill is for informational purposes only, and we decline any responsibility of any nature for any failure to report specific phenomena and for any consequence resulting from the interpretation and use of the information provided through the skill or derived from it in any form for further purposes.

CONTACT US: If you want to add an advertisement or report an improvement or ask new features, please send an email to revolutionary.voice.2020@gmail.com.
Thanks.
